config.name: Documentor Reference Components
config.description: Reference component library for Documentor testing

components.name: InputField
components.description:
InputField component - A flexible, accessible input field primitive with multiple variants and sizes.
Designed to be a standalone component for form inputs with built-in validation states.

components.name: Button
components.description:
Button component that supports multiple variants. This is the example
of the summary that can be added for these. Can I use code
snippets ike this? `<Button />`
